# User Guides

Practical guides and tutorials for using the Agentic Flow system.

- [Agent SDK Guide](agent-sdk.md) - Building custom agents with the SDK

- [NPM Publishing Guide](NPM-PUBLISH.md) - Publishing packages to NPM

## Model Configuration
